message.content:
{"id": "128359", "title": "Bug 128359: Incorrect logic when adding a filter to the table on the layout", "description": "We observed that the dataset initially has 10 records (DataResultA).", "OB": "When dragging the dataset to the layout and setting another filter (FilterB) on the table,", "EB": "the actual result is that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA.", "SR": "Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report and add a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set a filter (FilterA) in the dataset, resulting in 6 records in the dataset (DataResultB). 
3. Drag the dataset to the layout and set FilterB on the table.

Expected result: The result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

We set a filter(FilterA) in the dataset, and then the 6 records of the dataset(DataResultB) are gained.3. '}
